channel.title: Include SRL skills

item.title: Include SRL skills
item.dc:creator: @Dankness Dankness
item.description:
@Dankness wrote:

because you need to for SRL Mining as it requires different setup variables and bitmaps to be loaded whereas woodcutting does not.

Read full topic

item.title: Include SRL skills
item.dc:creator: @omgh4x0rz omgh4x0rz
item.description:
@omgh4x0rz wrote:

ok thanks, why does the included manual have you setupSRLmining? if you don’t need to for woodcutting.

Read full topic

item.title: Include SRL skills
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

SetupSRLWoodcutting is not needed, because all the Bitmaps and stuff inside Woodcutting.scar are local (inside procedures, and functions.) SetupSRL will do what you need, and make sure you still have {.include SRL\SRL\skill\Woodcutting.scar} at the top fo your script like you do.

Good luck with your script!

Read full topic

item.title: Include SRL skills
item.dc:creator: @_hai - hai -
item.description:
@_hai wrote:

I’m not too sure if you have to have setupSRLWoodCutting , or just have setupSRL
i’ve made two woodcutting scripts and never used setupSRLWoodCutting so i don’t think it’s needed , i might be wrong , but my scripts worked fine without it

Read full topic

item.title: Include SRL skills
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

you odnt have to setupsrlwoodcutting lol

all you have to do is use procedures and functions from the srl skill

Read full topic

item.title: Include SRL skills
item.dc:creator: @omgh4x0rz omgh4x0rz
item.description:
@omgh4x0rz wrote:

I can’t seem to be able to use any of the skills in SRL.
this is what i did

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/skill/WoodCutting.scar}

setupSRL;
setupSRLWoodCutting

Read full topic
